name: E-Board
description:
Companion app to the board game "Acquire". Instead of tedious lookups on the reference chart, this app does it all for you!

Features:
- Tracks tile placements, company creations, merges, and dead tiles
- Copy of the full reference chart for quick checks
- Cash Out screen for quick end-of-the-game calculations
- Includes crash resistance and recovery
- Supports 3 popular versions of the board game

Notice: THIS IS NOT A FULL VERSION OF THE GAME!
This app is meant to be a companion to the board game and enforces the official rules of the game.
This app uses the internet for anonymous tracking of feature usage.
